comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://neko-sama.fr/anime/episode/16692-jujutsu-kaisen-2-17_vostfr](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fneko-sama.fr%2Fanime%2Fepisode%2F16692-jujutsu-kaisen-2-17_vostfr) ### Comment > Depuis le temps que j'utilise AdGuard, c'est la première fois que je rencontre ce problème : lui qui normalement fais bien son taff, voilà qu'il ne bloque plus les fenêtres pop-up du site "Neko Sama". Quand je veux regarder un épisode, je suis systématiquement redirigée vers une autre page type league of legends ou des jeux sexuels. Username: @smallestanimal ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/iq5vcp9w7qgoc4skws4gko0c8kwkkc8te5yytc81qs.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qfrxexuj9mo0c8kss80wgk80k4wocwkkvilt3oydfk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.2.189 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:

AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Other Annoyances

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
